official_title: Calling upon Muammar Qaddafi to immediately release United States citizens detained in Libya.

summary.text: Calls upon Muammar Qaddafi to immediately release U.S. citizens detained in Libya and urges the National Transitional Council to search for and secure their release. Encourages the Department of State to request help locating any U.S. citizens who are missing in Libya from other nations who maintain a diplomatic presence in Libya.

titles.title: Calling upon Muammar Qaddafi to immediately release United States citizens detained in Libya.
